data.name: Destroy the Demon Army - Modified
data.detailed_description:
'Destroy the Demon Army - Modified' is a numerical strategy game. Recruit and upgrade your troops and try to eliminate the demon army in the shortest time possible.
This game is an overhauled version of '消灭魔王军 Destroy the demon army' . The original creators have already given consent for its production and release.

Highlights:
  • Adjustable idle speed
  • Fast-paced rounds - only a few minutes
  • 5 star achievement requires deep strategic thinking
  • Leaderboard for speedrunners

The second level of the game is "My Lucky Cat". You have a lucky cat at your home. You can cook food, buy items, and choose items for the cat to upgrade. Try to have the most gold possible.
The second level has a skip function, but note that the leaderboard can only be updated 10 times within 10 minutes.

The original game (first level only):
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1006170/_Destroy_the_demon_army/

data.short_description: 'Destroy the Demon Army - Modified' is an easy and hard numerical strategy game. Currently there are two levels. No more than 5% players can unlock 5 stars achivements.
data.supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU N3450 @1.10GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Need Windows Media Player 10

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Destroy the Demon Army - Modified
